pages.title: Icebox
pages.text: The <item>Icebox/$ is the simplest way to produce cold (aka remove heat). It's the cold equivalent of the <item>$(l:heat/firebox)firebox/$, burning cold items to cool at a constant rate. It can not cool below -20Â°C.$(br2)It connects to a <item>$(l:heat/cable)cable/$ on the top.
Typical fuels include (from worst to best): snowballs, snow, and ice. Better fuels last for longer.
